long_description: Head out for a run in the fresh style and light warmth of the women's MPG Tread Jacket. The eye-catching design and unique zippered lower sleeves set it apart from the crowd. Sleeves feature zippers along the underside of the lower arms for venting, and thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over top of hands for warmth. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture to keep you comfortable when working up a sweat, and mesh inserts along sleeves increase breathability. The women's MPG Tread Jacket features ergonomic seams placed to reduce chafing. Zip hand storage pockets; shaped hem; reflective tape along center back; reflective details on sleeves.
short_description: Head out for a run in the fresh style and light warmth of the women's MPG Tread Jacket. The eye-catching design and unique zippered lower sleeves set it apart from the crowd.
